column1: Computer Science or Computer Science (Artificial Intelligence) pathway (2-year) MSc
column5: Computer Science is playing a key role in many industries all around the world. Developments in artificial intelligence, apps and cybersecurity are changing how we live, work, and socialise. This two-year masters provides a more in-depth study of taught modules with a full-year research project.Taught modules in your first year will develop your knowledge in key topics such as user experience design, artificial intelligence, and data analysis. Optional modules allow you to to study specialist areas, including machine learning, cyber security and autonomous robotics.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
